The '''[[2008 NFL season|2008]] [[Atlanta Falcons]] season''' was the 43rd season for the team in the [[National Football League]]. Overcoming a dismal 4-12 season in [[2007 Atlanta Falcons season|2007]], the Falcons completed the regular season with an 11-5 record and earned the #5 seed in the NFC Playoffs under first-year head coach Mike Smith, but lost to the Arizona Cardinals in the first round of the playoffs.
The '''[[2008 NFL season|2008]] [[Atlanta Falcons]] season''' was the 43rd season for the team in the [[National Football League]]. Overcoming a dismal 4-12 season in [[2007 Atlanta Falcons season|2007]], the Falcons completed the regular season with an 11-5 record and earned the #5 seed in the NFC Playoffs under first-year head coach Mike Smith, but lost to the Arizona Cardinals in the first round of the playoffs.
